Articles.Content:
Hi!

I am looking for more docking ports.

So far my search has yielded zilch.

In particular I could use one with a diameter of 5m.

Thanks in advance!

[EDIT]

After a google site search of spaceport I came up with this:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/common-berthing-mechanisms-2-5m-docking-ports-2/

Sadly no 5m docking port. So I am still in the market for a 5m docking port.

[/EDIT]

Edited April 27, 2013 by Rusk
5m is BIG. Why do you want a 5 metre one? one You can use the 3m metre ones I suppose?
